lemma execn_to_execn_restrict: assumes execn: "\<Gamma>\<turnstile>\<langle>c,s\<rangle> =n\<Rightarrow> t" shows "\<exists>t'. \<Gamma>|\<^bsub>P\<^esub>\<turnstile>\<langle>c,s\<rangle> =n\<Rightarrow> t' \<and> (t=Stuck \<longrightarrow> t'=Stuck) \<and> (\<forall>f. t=Fault f \<longrightarrow> t'\<in>{Fault f,Stuck}) \<and> (t'\<noteq>Stuck \<longrightarrow> t'=t)"
